Author: kindbear_kindbud
Text: I looked this up and found out that your body burns slightly more calories than normal in the week or so leading up to your period. It burns slightly fewer than normal during your period. I'm not a scientist, but my understanding is that producing blood requires more energy, aka why donating blood "burns" calories-your body is working harder to replenish the blood. Before your period, you have to make more blood, but during your period it just... Falls out  Definitely sucks tho! Like, if I'm in pain and constantly wanting food, that should mean I'm operating at a calorie deficit right...

Author: TheLittlestPineapple
Text: So much suffering, all for nothing lmao
